about_the_game:
"The first 10 games you make are shit, but the 11th might be a good one." 1/10

Introduction

"Fire&Fly" is a game that I learned and made by myself in 4 months using UE. I used to work in Unity for a month to develop game prototypes because I had studied C# for a while, but after the Run Time Fee incident occurred in Unity, I switched to UE for learning. This was my experience from September to December. Games made between months. There are still many immature aspects, but as a practice product in the past two years, I will not continue to iterate on this work. I'm very sorry.😔😔😔 If you pay attention to more information about me, please send an email to my email or join the Discord account. I will make more games😊😊😊I love games so much

Type

Fast-paced 3D platform shooter

Game theme

The game tells how a warrior AI is trained in the AI ​​world.

Game features

Use skills such as sprint, hook lock, bullet time, wall running and other skills to move at high speed and shoot enemies at the same time

PS

Thank you for your time and have a nice day.

"The first 10 games you make are shit, but the 11th might be a good one." 1/10

Introduction

"Fire&Fly" is a game that I learned and made by myself in 4 months using UE. I used to work in Unity for a month to develop game prototypes because I had studied C# for a while, but after the Run Time Fee incident occurred in Unity, I switched to UE for learning. This was my experience from September to December. Games made between months. There are still many immature aspects, but as a practice product in the past two years, I will not continue to iterate on this work. name: Fire&Fly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 and above
  • Processor: I7-4790
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows7 and above
  • Processor: Intel core I7-4790 and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In this fast-paced 3D platform game, control an AI warrior and improve your combat skills in a virtual world. Use skills such as wall running, sprinting, grappling hook, and bullet time to pass a total of 12 levels of training and defeat the final boss to complete the challenge.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
